member.summary: Create an individual with a specific name.

The name to place directly into the name field.

member.name: M:GeneGenie.Gedcom.Tests.DataHelperExtensions.GedcomIndividualRecordFactory.NamedPerson(GeneGenie.Gedcom.GedcomDatabase,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create an individual with a specific name.

The given name (first name) to attach to the new individual.

member.name: T:GeneGenie.Gedcom.Tests.EncoderTests.GedcomAnselEncoderTest
member.summary: Rigorous tests to ensure that Ansel files can be can be properly loaded and converted to Unicode.

member.name: M:GeneGenie.Gedcom.Tests.EncoderTests.GedcomAnselEncoderTest.Ansel_charset_is_recognised
member.summary: Checks that the Ansel encoding is recognised.

member.name: M:GeneGenie.Gedcom.Tests.EncoderTests.GedcomAnselEncoderTest.Record_count_is_33_children_plus_two_parents
member.summary: Test to catch the addition of child records so that we can add tests for them. If this fails, we need to test the characters in the new entries.

member.name: M:GeneGenie.Gedcom.Tests.EncoderTests.GedcomAnselEncoderTest.Characters_can_be_translated_to_unicode(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Uses the Ansel test file supplied by Heiner Eichmann to test every character in Ansel can be decoded into Unicode. The expected test data has been rigorously checked to ensure the Unicode characters match exactly. If your editor is not Unicode aware updates them, they'll probably fail.
member.param: The name of the child test record in the Ansel.ged file.
The expected text to find in the birth place field, after translation to Unicode.
The expected text to find in the death place field, after translation to Unicode.

member.name: T:GeneGenie.Gedcom.Tests.EncoderTests.GedcomAnsiEncoderTest
member.summary: Rigorous tests to ensure that ANSI files can be can be properly loaded and converted to Unicode.

member.name: M:GeneGenie.Gedcom.Tests.EncoderTests.GedcomAnsiEncoderTest.Ansi_charset_is_recognised
member.summary: Checks that the ANSI encoding is recognised.

member.name: M:GeneGenie.Gedcom.Tests.EncoderTests.GedcomAnsiEncoderTest.Record_count_is_125_individuals
member.summary: Test to catch the addition of child records so that we can add tests for them. If this fails, we need to test the characters in the new entries.

member.name: M:GeneGenie.Gedcom.Tests.EncoderTests.GedcomAnsiEncoderTest.Characters_can_be_translated_to_unicode(System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Uses the Ansi test file to test every character in ANSI can be decoded into Unicode.
member.param: The name of the child test record in the ansi.ged file.
The expected integer value to find in the birth place field, before any translation.
The expected text to find in the birth place field, after translation to Unicode.
